subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia, who last season was the first Indian to win the Cy Young since Gaylord Perry in 1972, could become a free agent and be lured by a big-city team near an ocean.
snippet: C. C. Sabathia, who last season was the first Indian to win the Cy Young since Gaylord Perry in 1972, could become a free agent and be lured by a big-city team near an ocean.
